title: Comparative Effectiveness of Online vs. Face-to-Face Education and Blended Learning Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and administrative job experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning design combining microlearning content accessible via mobile devices in BYOD environments with one-day intensive face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Learners can comparatively analyze the strengths and weaknesses of online/in-person educational delivery modes
Learners can apply blended learning design principles to develop organizational training strategies
Learners can demonstrate the integrated effectiveness of both approaches in project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
